data.eml:eml: A review of the Japanese species of the genus Scardia Treitschke (Lepidoptera, Tineidae), with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Osada, Yohei, Sakai, Makoto, Hirowatari, Toshiya (2016): A review of the Japanese species of the genus Scardia Treitschke (Lepidoptera, Tineidae), with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4079 (3), DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4079.3.4
